author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Periyar University will release the results of the university semester examinations of post-graduate courses at 10 a.m. on Friday (January 15).

The semester examinations for the PG students of all the affiliated colleges were held in the month of November 2015.

As many as 18,000 students from 69 colleges appeared for the examinations.

A press release issued here on Thursday said that the students can view the results through the university website: www.periyaruniversity.ac.in.

Students can also collect the results from their respective colleges on the same day.

Further, the university has made arrangements for informing the results to the students directly through SMS, it said.

He also has appreciated the arduous efforts taken by the Controller of Examinations S. Leela and other staff attached to the office of the Controller of Examinations for releasing the results in time.

Students, who wish to apply for re-totalling, can submit the application forms along with the required fee through the Principal of the respective colleges so as to reach the Office of Controller of Examination within 10 days from the date of publication of results.

After obtaining the photocopy of the answer script, if necessary, the students can further apply for revaluation along the necessary fee within seven days, the release added.
title: Periyar University results today
